encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: Hellenistic Bookhands.
bibl.note: Preface. - Abbreviations and Bibliography. - Introduction: Greek alphabetic writing; - Hellenistic bookhands; - The oldest surviving Greek books; - Book production and literary scripts; - The emergence of Greek cursive; - Features common to literary and documentary scripts; - The second century; - The first centuries BC and AD; - Conclusions; - Layout; - Aids to the reader; - Indicators of scholarly activity. - Texts and Plates. 96 papyri, mostly from Egypt but also from Herculaneum, from the later fourth century BC up to and including the Augustan era. - List of Papyri. Ancient Authors. General Index.
